sourcesContent:
import React, { Component } from 'react';
import { Link } from "react-router-dom";
import { Dropdown, Icon, Menu, Header, Content, Item } from 'semantic-ui-react';
import Faturamento from "../body/mainFunction/mainFunction";
import "./styles.css";

const styleLink = document.createElement("link");
styleLink.rel = "stylesheet";
styleLink.href = "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/semantic-ui/dist/semantic.min.css";
document.head.appendChild(styleLink);

export default class MenuExampleSubMenu extends Component {
  state = {}


  handleItemClick = async (e, name) => {
    this.setState({ activeItem: name })

  }


  render() {
    const { activeItem } = this.state

    return (
      <Menu inverted
        vertical
        fixed="left"
        size="huge"
        color="orange">
        <Menu.Item>
          Portal de Faturamento - Adm
        </Menu.Item>

        {/* Menu Faturamento */}
        <Dropdown item text='Faturamento'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>

            <Menu.Item
              name='billing'
              active={activeItem === 'billing'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Link className="link" to="/app/faturamento">
                <Header icon="edit" size="small" content='Faturar' />
              </Link>
            </Menu.Item>

            <Menu.Item
              name='showBilling'
              active={activeItem === 'showBilling'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Header icon='file alternate' size="small" content='Visualizar Faturamento'>
              <Link className="link" to="/app/fechamentos"></Link>
              </Header>
            </Menu.Item>

            <Menu.Item
              name='checkBilling'
              active={activeItem === 'checkBilling'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Link className="link" to="/app/fechamentos">
                <Header icon='file alternate outline' size="small" content='Faturamentos Realizados' />
              </Link>
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='percent'
              text='Consumo Total'
              name='consumeTotal'
              active={activeItem === 'consumeTotal'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='percent' />Consumo Total
              </Menu.Item>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Backup Faturamento */}
        <Dropdown item text='Backup Faturamento'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='save'
              text='Realizar Backup'
              name='backup'
              active={activeItem === 'backup'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='save' />Realizar Backup
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='save outline'
              text='Backups à Realizar'
              name='toBackup'
              active={activeItem === 'toBackup'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='save outline' />Backups à Realizar
              </Menu.Item>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Manter Ramais */}
        <Dropdown item text='Manter Ramais'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone square'
              text='Registrar Ramais'
              name='extReg'
              active={activeItem === 'extReg'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone square' />Registrar Ramais
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Ativar Ramais'
              name='extActivate'
              active={activeItem === 'extActivate'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Ativar Ramais
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Ramais Mês'
              name='extMonth'
              active={activeItem === 'extMonth'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Ramais Mês
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Mudar Ramal de Grupo'
              name='extChangeGroup'
              active={activeItem === 'extChangeGroup'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Mudar Ramal de Grupo
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Desativar Ramais'
              name='extDeactivate'
              active={activeItem === 'extDeactivate'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Desativar Ramais
              </Menu.Item>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Consultar Ramais */}
        <Dropdown item text='Consultar Ramais'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone square'
              text='Listar Ramais'
              name='extensions'
              active={activeItem === 'extensions'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone square' />Listar Ramais
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Ramal'
              name='ext'
              active={activeItem === 'ext'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Ramal
              </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Ramais Mês'
              name='extMonth'
              active={activeItem === 'extMonth'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Ramais Mês
                </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='phone'
              text='Ramais Quantidade'
              name='extQty'
              active={activeItem === 'extQty'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='phone' />Ramais Quantidade
                </Menu.Item>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Tipo de Ligações */}
        <Dropdown item text='Manter Tipo de Ligações'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='teletype'
              text='Manter'
              name='typeReg'
              active={activeItem === 'typeReg'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='teletype' />Manter
                  </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='teletype'
              text='Listar'
              name='type'
              active={activeItem === 'type'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='teletype' />Listar
                </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='delete'
              text='Remover'
              name='typeDel'
              active={activeItem === 'typeDel'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='delete' />Remover
                </Menu.Item>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>

        {/* Menu Tarifas */}
        <Dropdown item text='Manter Tarifas'>
          <Dropdown.Menu>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='teletype'
              text='Registrar Tarifas'
              name='typeReg'
              active={activeItem === 'typeReg'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='teletype' />Registrar Tarifas
                  </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='teletype'
              text='Listar Tarifas'
              name='fareShow'
              active={activeItem === 'fareShow'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='teletype' />Listar Tarifas
                </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='teletype'
              text='Atualizar Tarifas'
              name='fareUpdt'
              active={activeItem === 'fareUpdt'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='teletype' />Atualizar Tarifas
                </Menu.Item>
            <Menu.Item
              icon='delete'
              text='Remover Tarifas'
              name='fareDel'
              active={activeItem === 'fareDel'}
              onClick={this.handleItemClick}>
              <Icon name='delete' />Remover Tarifas
                </Menu.Item>
          </Dropdown.Menu>
        </Dropdown>


        <Menu.Item
          name='logout'
          active={activeItem === 'logout'}
          onClick={this.handleItemClick}
        >
          <Icon name='sign out' />
          Logout
        </Menu.Item>
      </Menu>
    )
  }
}
